Alright, this is just an idea I'm throwing out there for all to  consider.   The Shinsengumi/Edoji/& Spy division have a  an excellent home and message board going all thanks to the sweat and  blood of the presistant fans that keep the mailing lists going  strong.  My idea was, how 'bout we make a chatroom?    Maybe not on the actual site but on mIRC... Somewhere were we can all  meet and chit chat about everything and anything that comes to  mind.   It'll be a great way to get to know the memebers of  the 3 mailing lists.   What do you guys think?
  
  -Bunneh
